thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: A.H
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by A.H

author: A.H
title: A.H
text:
Excellent service received at every step of the way
From our 1st call to the office for information to the time of interview with
Jackie Fransky, interview's with counsellor to the final step & the discharge our experience has been very good.
Jackie was very understanding, knowledgable, friendly & gave her full support.
We are very happy & would recommend David Sklar & Assciates at anytime to anyone
